snippet: The Giants return this weekend to San Francisco, where they defeated the 49ers in the N.F.C. title game in January but where quarterback Eli Manning was battered throughout the game.
abstract: New York Giants offensive line aims to protect quarterback Eli Manning in upcoming game against San Francisco 49ers; Manning was sacked six times and officially hit 12 times during the Giants victory over the 49ers in the NFC title game last season.
lead_paragraph: The Giants return this weekend to San Francisco, where they defeated the 49ers in the N.F.C. title game in January but where quarterback Eli Manning was battered throughout the game.

headline.seo: Giants’ Offensive Line Driven to Keep Manning ‘Clean’
headline.main: Giants’ Line Driven to Protect Manning Against 49ers
headline.print_headline: Giants’ Line Is Driven To Protect Manning
